ygData.subject: Re: Ok, now what? (spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The EXG is magic resistant, but the other clockworks aren t.  You ll have the best luck with the M series clockworks near the foreman area, I didn t get
ygData.messageBody:
"Steven E. Phipps" wrote:
>
> From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>
>
> Well, I have everything except the bracers and leggings. I am not familier
> at all wih solusek a, but I do have a map. How hard is this malatite to get?
> clockworks tough? I heard they werre totally resistant to magic. This mean a
> tank heavy group with a shaman/cleric to keep them running? (we are in 30+
> range)
>

The EXG is magic resistant, but the other clockworks aren't. You'll
have the best luck with the M series clockworks near the foreman area,
I didn't get any when storming the gnome castle. Beware the MB and CB
series as they push you back with a force attack, and may knock you in
lava.

> I went to the mino caves. Were three other shadowknights there, said been
> there 6 hours with no spawn. We grouped with them for awhile, but no way am
> I gonna do a 16 hour camp (or more) for the shackles. Then come and do it
> again? Geesh, who wants to stand and line for them? Any tips on getting the
> mino to spawn? How long has it taken you all?
> Any tips of getting the malatite? The armor I think looks very damn cool on
> a ogre...8) But I wanta get rid of these bronze leggings and bracers asap.
> Thanks for any help/tips in advance.
>

Mino hero doesn't spawn in the caves I don't think. I think he
spawns south of the caves behind the big gears. Seems to be on a
2-4 hour spawnn, perhaps killing the wandering Mino's in Steamfont
helps?

Xilith
